    Create a new connection invitation for the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `connection:write`

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

  parameters={undefined}

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["error_url","success_url"],"type":"object","properties":{"success_url":{"maxLength":250,"minLength":1,"type":"string","description":"URL of where to redirect the seller after accepting the invitation","example":"https://merchantwebsite.com/success"},"error_url":{"maxLength":250,"minLength":1,"type":"string","description":"URL of where to redirect the seller after declining the invitation","example":"https://merchantwebsite.com/error"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"CreateConnectionInvitationRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
